title: Three solutions
description: Two correct and many incorrect ways to write this program

comments:
The speed of the program depends on the number of 
statements the central processor unit ("CPU")
needs to run (or "execute")
to complete your program.

Hint #1 There's more than one program that solves this puzzle.
Can you see three solutions? Which one is fastest? Which one is Slowest?
Hint #2 I wonder what happens if you go too far...
Hint #3 What will you do with each line? Up,Down,Delete?
